name: MoveThatBlock
tag_list: real-estate, jobs, internships, listing, classifieds, commercial, residential
overview:
Welcome to the Block!

We began our journey to create the worldâ€™s best website in 2009 and officially launched September 13, 2010. Our goal is to provide you with professional, paid quality sites free of charge. The idea came about because we were tired of paying for services we felt should be free for our users. Our categories include: Commercial Real Estate, Residential Real Estate, Apartments & Home Rentals, Jobs & Internships, and more categories in development. We believe we offer the best features of each category with a simple, effortless process to post and search.

MoveThatBlock.com is set out to re-write the future of how online sites provide services to its customers. With MoveThatBlock.com the days of paying a fee to list a property or post job openings are over.

milestones.description: Sponsoring the MoveThatBlock.com Indy 225 on August 14th at the New Hampshire Motor Speedway.
